## SetupAPI.getSetup() method

Check if database has default user, org, bucket. See [https://docs.influxdata.com/influxdb/v2.1/api/\#operation/GetSetup](https://docs.influxdata.com/influxdb/v2.1/api/#operation/GetSetup)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript

```
